name: computesdk
description: A unified abstraction layer for executing code in secure, isolated sandboxed environments across multiple cloud providers

scripts.build: pnpm --filter '@computesdk/cmd' run build && pnpm --filter '@computesdk/client' run build && pnpm --filter computesdk run build && pnpm --filter './packages/*' --filter '!computesdk' --filter '!@computesdk/client' --filter '!@computesdk/cmd' run build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter './packages/*' run typecheck && pnpm --filter './examples/*' run typecheck

author: Garrison
